Text.Page: The goddess Velik wants to look at Manahan's memories using an object that contains his power. Look at the memories and thwart his plans.

The goddess Velik looks at Manahan's memories and finds out that Shandra Manaya has been resurrected. The goddess Velik orders you to defeat Shandra Manaya before any more problems occur.
You went to the Hall of the Argon Queen where you defeated Revivified Shandra Manaya, once again saving Arborea from doom.

If you put power into Manahan's Totem, you will be able to observe the moment when Agaia's power was used at its strongest.
Are you ready to see Manahan's memories?

Shandra Manaya has been resurrected...
Manahan seems to be doing all he can to get rid of Agaia's influence.

If the seal of Agaia breaks, Arborea will once again be plunged into chaos like during the War of the Gods.
You must defeat Shandra Manaya to prevent this disaster from taking its course in the first place. "Mysterious crystal?"

I sensed Karas' energy in the crystal.
Some time has passed since Karas disappeared, but I'm glad that's he's still keeping Manahan in check.

However, the fact that he himself is leaving a message is a bad omen.
I need to ask you for help again. Defeat Shandra Manaya and stop Manahan."Got it."

I'll send you to Granarkus.

Let me know when you're ready.

It surprised me that Shandra Manaya had been resurrected.
It is clear that Manahan's power is growing stronger all the time.

Additionally, the uncertainty about the situation in the Hall of the Argon Queen is a big problem.
Let's go inside and split up to find out more.

You defeated Shandra Manaya, ! I shouldn't be surprised though, considering your skills.
Shandra Manaya's death has certainly foiled Manahan's plans. We can rest a little easier now.You nod.

Now that the situation is under control, you should report back to the goddess Velik.

Let me know when you're ready. I will send you directly to Velik's Sanctuary.

Greetings, .
I have sensed that Manahan's power has grown weaker.
Did you defeat Shandra Manaya?You give your report.

Manahan won't be able to resurrect Shandra Manaya another time.
However, I'm sure he won't back down so easily. We need to be on our guard.
Besides, we still need to find out what that new power is that Karas was talking about.

Please continue to do your best for Arborea.
